text: Simon & Schuster Inc. is an American publishing company. It was founded in 1924. The company is based in New York City, It is one of the four main publishers who publish English language books. The first book Simon & Schuster published was a book of crossword puzzles with a pencil attached. The company has published best sellers by many people, including Stephen King and Hillary Clinton. Category:Publishing companies of the United States Category:Companies based in New York City Category:1924 establishments in the United States Category:1920s establishments in New York (state)
title: Simon & Schuster
